thing-type.label: Meter device
thing-type.description: The meter device to read the SML or IEC 62056-21 messages from

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Connected serial port
parameter.description: The device serial port (e.g. /dev/tty0 or COM1)

parameter.name: baudrateChangeDelay
parameter.label: Delay of baudrate change in ms
parameter.description: USB to serial converters often require a delay of up to 250ms after the ACK before changing baudrate

parameter.name: baudrate
parameter.label: Baudrate
parameter.description: The baudrate of the serial port. If set to 'auto', it will be negotiated with the meter.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.label: The protocol mode to use
parameter.description: Can be SML (PUSH mode), Mode A,B,C (PULL)or D (PUSH)

parameter.name: conversionRatio
parameter.label: Conversion ratio
parameter.description: An quotient to use for conversion of the number
